content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good day Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am very happy to hear that you are interested in renting it. As you know, I am looking for the highest rental price possible for this apartment, which is 25 square meters. May I ask what kind of budget you have in mind for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 500 Euros per month. I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. Is that possible?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. I would like to remind you that the apartment is quite small, measuring only 25 square meters, but it is located in a prime location in Mannheim. I am confident that with the right tenant, I can get a rental price of at least 600 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider that price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to see the apartment first, then we can discuss the rental price. Can you show me around?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I would be happy to show you around the apartment. Please follow me and I will lead the way.
name: Heinrich Heine
